{ const newData = [...data]; newData[cellInfo.index][cellInfo.column.id] = e.target.innerHTML; setData( newData ); }} dangerouslySetInnerHTML = {{ __html: data[cellInfo.index][cellInfo.column.id] }} /> ); } return (
